Monologue.Current: Преподаватель{Line}“В ночные часы все помещения закрыты,{Line} за исключение тернировочного центра.”{Next}“Вернись в свою комнату.”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“It’s after-hours. All facilities except{Line} the training center are closed.”{Next}“Return to your quarters.”

Monologue.Current: Garden Faculty{Line}“I want you to check{Line} this entire floor.”{Next}“Cid is definitely hiding{Line} somewhere on this floor!”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“I want you to check{Line} this entire floor.”{Next}“Cid is definitely hiding{Line} somewhere on this floor!”

Monologue.Current: Garden Faculty{Line}“Another Cid follower, eh?”{Line} Prepare to die!”
